title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Abundant
expl: Abundant means existing in large quantity; plentiful.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Fragile
expl: Fragile means easily broken; its antonym is strong.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Eloquent
expl: Eloquent means fluent or persuasive in speaking.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Hostile
expl: Hostile means unfriendly; the opposite is friendly.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Prudent
expl: Prudent means wise or cautious.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Expand
expl: Expand means to increase; contract is the opposite.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Lucid
expl: Lucid means clear or easy to understand.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Permanent
expl: Permanent means lasting; temporary is the opposite.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Tedious
expl: Tedious means boring or tiresome.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Victory
expl: Victory means success; defeat is its opposite.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Resilient
expl: Resilient means able to recover quickly; flexible.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Generous
expl: Generous means giving; stingy is the opposite.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Rapid
expl: Rapid means fast or quick.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Honest
expl: Honest means truthful; dishonest is the opposite.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Scarce
expl: Scarce means rare or insufficient.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Ancient
expl: Ancient means very old; modern is the opposite.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Diligent
expl: Diligent means hardworking.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Accept
expl: Accept means to receive; reject is the opposite.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the synonym of the word: Cautious
expl: Cautious means careful.

title: English Vocabulary
text: Choose the antonym of the word: Victory
expl: Victory means win; defeat is its antonym.
